meanings.definition: (transitive) to observe, watch, pay attention to
meanings.english_definition: to observe, watch, pay attention to

etymology.value: From Middle Dutch "gadeslān", equivalent to "gade" (companion, from Old Dutch "gado") + "slaan" (to strike, hit, but also to look, observe).

usage_notes.explanation: This verb is relatively formal and less common in everyday speech. It implies a deliberate and focused observation.
